description: Geared to climb – crag, gym, approach – the Konseal delivers durability, performance, and comfort with a look that easily works off the rock. The fabric combines organically grown cotton’s natural comfort, nylon’s strength, and elastane’s stretch. A gusseted crotch and articulated knees free you to move, tapered legs with drawcord hems improve line of sight to your feet, the waist rides comfortably under a harness, and pockets include an easy-access zippered one at the thigh.
name: Arcteryx Konseal Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: 69% cotton, 29% nylon and 2% elastane, PFC-free DWR finish for water repellency
PFCs are a class of chemicals used to provide highly effective water repellency to textiles, but are known to persist in the environment.
